title: Fabien Galthié - Wikipedia
snippet: Galthié won his only club trophy on his last competitive match, the French championship final with Stade Français against Toulouse on 7 June 2003 at Stade de France (32–18). Galthié became the coach of Stade Français in 2004 after head coach Nick Mallet departed the Paris club.

title: Fabien Galthié, the perfectionist masterminding France's Rugby World Cup tilt
